title: Hunter's Moon
description: It's time to claim my fateLast week, I was a hotel maid who had no idea magic existed. Today, I’m the prisoner of a werewolf pack. I had to steal from them to save a friend, and now I’m behind bars. The shifter council has given me two choices — fix the problem I’ve created. Or die.To make thing more complicated, the werewolf alpha is my fated mate—and now he hates me for my betrayal. The attraction between us is off the charts, but it doesn't matter. His loyalty is to his pack. He would avoid me if he could, but he can't. When we're forced to work together to save his pack, it becomes clear that neither of us is going to escape with our hearts intact.Hunter's Moon is the final book of Linsey Hall's enemies to lovers, fated mates romance duology. If you like humor, spice, and action, then this is the series for you.
author: Linsey Hall
